title: Nuclearly (minicast) - 6 Oct. 2009
description:
Is it acceptable to make a brand-new adverb simply by adding an -ly to an adjective? A scientist wants to know, and specifically a term she uses, nuclearly.  --  Get your language question answered on the air!
